name: iBerry
description: iBerry is a volunteer-based not-for-profit group founded in 1998 that provides information and resources for self-learners, educators and others with interests in Higher Education. We maintain and develop an open courseware directory, ( The iBerry OCW Finder ), searchable according to subject, media type and academic level, giving annotated listings of publicly available courseware from the universities and colleges of the world.
